instructions:
Instructions

What to do with the stuff to be making the meal, the meal being of course Jollof rice and plantain.
ingredients:
Finally, Jollof itself

A set of stuff what goes in to make said meal, said meal being Jollof rice and plantain.
about: Some prefer the traditional spicy taste with a characteristic smoky flavour imparted by the cast iron pots in which it has been cooked. Others prefer an al-dente style with the grains not sticking together. A recent survey concluded that we all like to enjoy our Jollof rice in different and imaginative ways.
